Html:
Hi everybody!

I want to set fill for all cell in my sheet is white, I wrote below, it does not work:

$objPHPExcel->getActiveSheet()->getDefaultStyle()->getFill()->setFillType(PHPExcel_Style_Fill::FILL_SOLID);
$objPHPExcel->getActiveSheet()->getDefaultStyle()->getFill()->getStartColor()->setARGB('FFFFFFFF');

 But when i wrote below, it work:

$objPHPExcel->getActiveSheet()->getStyle('B5')->getFill()->setFillType(PHPExcel_Style_Fill::FILL_SOLID);
$objPHPExcel->getActiveSheet()->getStyle('B5')->getFill()->getStartColor()->setARGB('FFFFFFFF');


please help me!

Thanks everybody!
Setting background color on the default style is not supported by Excel. This can only be done for specific cells. Font face etc. however can be set on the default style.
